summary: A box mode that encodes bounding boxes using center coordinates and size dimensions, supporting both 2‑D (xmin, ymin, width, height) and 3‑D (xmin, ymin, zmin, width, height, depth) formats and offering conversion to corner‑based representations.
business_intent: Facilitate uniform processing of bounding box data in computer‑vision workflows by providing a standard center‑size representation and seamless transformation to corner coordinates for detection, tracking, and annotation tasks.
